SELECT mar.area_code AS regionId, mar.area_name AS regionName, mar.grade as regionGrade,IFNULL(t_ro.needNum,0) as countyNeedPatrolNum townNeedPatrolNum villageNeedPatrolNum FROM md_administrative_region mar LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t_rn.regionId, SUM(t_rn.needReachNum) as needNum FROM ( SELECT CONCAT(LEFT(su.region_id,6),'000000')
CONCAT(LEFT(su.region_id,9),'000')
su.region_id
AS regionId, mrcm.CHAIRMANLEVEL, mrcm.chairman_role , #{intervalMonths}*IFNULL(ach.patrolMarkMonth,IFNULL(ach.patrolMarkTenDay*3,IFNULL(ach.patrolMarkWeek * 4, IFNULL(ach.patrolMarkDay * 30,0)))) AS needReachNum FROM md_reachchairman mrcm, am_check_standard ach, sm_user su WHERE mrcm.CHAIRMANLEVEL=#{regionGrade} AND ach.roleLevel = mrcm.CHAIRMANLEVEL AND ach.roleId = mrcm.chairman_role AND su.id=mrcm.CHAIRMANID GROUP BY mrcm.chairmanid )t_rn GROUP BY t_rn.regionId )t_ro ON t_ro.regionId=mar.area_code WHERE mar.grade=#{grade}
AND LEFT(mar.id,2)=LEFT(#{regionId}, 2)
AND LEFT(mar.id,6)=LEFT(#{regionId}, 6)
AND LEFT(mar.id,9)=LEFT(#{regionId}, 9)
ORDER BY regionId

SELECT mar.area_code AS regionId, mar.area_name AS regionName, mar.grade as regionGrade,IFNULL(t_ro.hadNum,0) as countyHasPatrolNum townHasPatrolNum villageHasPatrolNum FROM md_administrative_region mar LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t_rn.regionId,t_rn.chairmanlevel, SUM(t_rn.hadNum) as hadNum FROM ( SELECT
CONCAT(LEFT(mr.region_code,6),'000000')
CONCAT(LEFT(mr.region_code,9),'000')
mr.region_code
AS regionId,mrcm.chairmanlevel,COUNT(mlc.REACHID) as hadNum FROM md_locusrecord mlc, md_reachchairman mrcm, md_reach mr WHERE mlc.REACHID=mrcm.reachid AND mrcm.chairmanlevel=#{regionGrade} AND mr.id=mlc.reachid
AND mlc.`CREATETIME` >= CONCAT(#{startTime},' 00:00:00')
AND mlc.`CREATETIME` <= CONCAT(#{endTime},' 23:59:59')
GROUP BY mlc.REACHID )t_rn GROUP BY t_rn.regionId )t_ro ON t_ro.regionId=mar.area_code WHERE mar.grade=#{grade}
AND LEFT(mar.id,2)=LEFT(#{regionId}, 2)
AND LEFT(mar.id,6)=LEFT(#{regionId}, 6)
AND LEFT(mar.id,9)=LEFT(#{regionId}, 9)
ORDER BY regionId

SELECT t_all.chairman_name AS reachmanName, t_all.CHAIRMANLEVEL as reachmanLevel, t_all.needReachNum AS needReachNum, t_all.hadReachNum AS hadReachNum FROM ( SELECT t_rn.regionStr, t_rn.chairman_name, t_rn.CHAIRMANLEVEL, t_rn.needReachNum, IFNULL(t_ur.hadReachNum,0) AS hadReachNum FROM ( SELECT
CONCAT(LEFT(su.region_id,6),'000000')
CONCAT(LEFT(su.region_id,9),'000')
su.region_id
AS regionStr,mrcm.chairman_name, mrcm.CHAIRMANLEVEL,mrcm.CHAIRMANID, #{intervalMonths}*IFNULL(ach.patrolMarkMonth,IFNULL(ach.patrolMarkTenDay*3,IFNULL(ach.patrolMarkWeek * 4, IFNULL(ach.patrolMarkDay * 30,0)))) AS needReachNum FROM md_reachchairman mrcm, am_check_standard ach, sm_user su WHERE ach.roleLevel = mrcm.CHAIRMANLEVEL AND ach.roleId = mrcm.chairman_role AND su.id=mrcm.chairmanid AND mrcm.chairmanlevel=#{regionGrade} GROUP BY mrcm.CHAIRMANID )t_rn LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t_r.chairmanid,t_r.chairman_name,region_code,SUM(t_r.hadNum) AS hadReachNum FROM ( SELECT mrcm.chairmanid,mrcm.chairman_name,mr.region_code,mrcm.chairmanlevel,COUNT(mlc.REACHID) as hadNum FROM md_locusrecord mlc, md_reach mr, md_reachchairman mrcm WHERE mlc.REACHID=mrcm.reachid AND mrcm.chairmanlevel=#{regionGrade} AND mr.id=mlc.reachid
AND mlc.`CREATETIME` >= CONCAT(#{startTime},' 00:00:00')
AND mlc.`CREATETIME` <= CONCAT(#{endTime},' 23:59:59')
GROUP BY mlc.REACHID )t_r GROUP BY t_r.chairmanid )t_ur ON t_rn.CHAIRMANID=t_ur.chairmanid )t_all WHERE regionStr=#{regionId}
SELECT id as regionId, area_name as regionName from md_administrative_region WHERE parent_code = #{parentId}

SELECT mar.area_name AS regionName, ee.EVENTREACHNAME AS riverName, mrcm.chairman_name AS chairmanName, ee.TYPENAME AS problemType FROM eh_event ee, md_reach mr, md_reachchairman mrcm, md_administrative_region mar WHERE ee.EVENTREACHID=mr.id AND ee.createtime >= date_sub(curdate(),interval MONTH(curdate()) day) AND mrcm.REACHID=mr.id AND mr.region_code=mar.area_code ORDER BY ee.CREATETIME DESC
